text:
SALEM

Srimadh Thyagaraja Venkataramana Bhagavath Swamigal Mahotsava Sabha: Annual aradhana festival, Sourashtra Kalyana mandapam, Ammapet main road, 6 p.m.

Department of Field Publicity: Special outreach programme, Valaiyamadevi, 10 a.m.

Government Museum: Visit of mobile museum, Government Higher Secondary School, Mallur, Ammapettai and Kajalnayakkanpatti, 10 a.m. and 2 p.m.

Junior Jaycees Wing of Periyar Institute of Management Studies: Outbound training programme on ‘effective public speaking,’ Hotel Tamil Nadu, Yercaud, 10.30 a.m.

Thiagarajar Polytechnic College and Sona College of Technology: Sona-Thiag Fiesta 2015-26, Science Day, 9 a.m.

AVS College of Technology: Release of the book Digital AVS,

4 p.m.

Commissionerate of Central Excise: Tax Payers Day, Foulk’s compound, Analmedu, 9 a.m.

NAMAKKAL

Paavai Arts and Science College for Women: NSS special camp, Government School, Kozhingipatti, 11 a.m.

PGP College of Engineering and Technology: Department of Management Studies, workshop on ‘communication skill development’, 10 a.m.

Gnanamani College of Engineering: Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering, seminar on ‘recent trends in industrial automation’, T. Arangannal Chairman, presides, 10 a.m.

ERODE

Gobi Arts and Science College: Workshop by Department of Management, 10 a.m.

EBET Group of Institutions: Hindi language training, 4.15 p.m.

Shree Venkateshwara Hi-Tech Engineering College: National-level technical symposium, 9.30 a.m.
title: engagements
